title: [Client] Musketeer Twisted Fate art inconsistency
body: The card art for Musketeer Twisted Fate and the splash art for it are different in client. Just something I guess was missed in the art update.

replies.body:
Morning FlaymeengTako! 

Thanks for the report! We're looking into it! :) If all goes as planned, this should be resolved for 6.10. ^-^

yep, the splash art is correct in the client but the loading asset is not (should be using the Chinese version)

the game loading asset however is using the Chinese version
